Additionally,  wish the iphone app would be released. using the remote is fairly annoying, just another remote to have laying around.Overall, the only benefit over my chromecast (which I love) is that it allows me to stream my prime tv shows. it does get misleading which are free/not though. Still a better fan of netflix.
